# Read the Age Rating Declaration Information of an App Store Version

**Web Service Endpoint**

Get the age-related information declared for your app.

## Reading Declarations

- **GET /v1/appStoreVersions/{id}/relationships/ageRatingDeclaration**
- **Read the Routing App Coverage Information of an App Store Version**: Get the routing app coverage file that is associated with a specific App Store version
- **GET /v1/appStoreVersions/{id}/relationships/routingAppCoverage**
